titleStmt.title: A declaration of the difference of the ministers of the word from the ministers of the world; who calls the writings, the word. By G.F. The ministers of the word now lyeth in prisons for witnessing Christ the vvord, by them who have the vvritings, who are filling up the measure of their fathers who had the vvritings and persecuted the vvord, and the ministers of the vvord.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

titleStmt.title: A declaration of the difference of the ministers of the word from the ministers of the world; who calls the writings, the word. By G.F. The ministers of the word now lyeth in prisons for witnessing Christ the vvord, by them who have the vvritings, who are filling up the measure of their fathers who had the vvritings and persecuted the vvord, and the ministers of the vvord.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert, at the Black-spread-Eagle at the West End of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Febr. 21 1655"; also the last number of the imprint date has been marked through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
